metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12900 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: BZ2_decompress in decompress.c in bzip2 through 1.0.6 has an out-of-bounds write when there are many selectors.

notes.Note: leosilva> first fix cause a regression see LP: 1834494 alexmurray> clamav has a vendored copy of bzip2 which is used by the nulsft/nsis scanner. only affects clamav versions < 0.101.4

criterions.comment: bzip2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
clamav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
